title: The Pride of Plymouth Rock
description: The story of two Mayflower Pilgrims and their life in Plymouth Colony. One film every patriotic American has been waiting for.
quote: Gaze upon this bountiful and beauteous place.
altHero: two Pilgrims, a man and a woman, talk with the ocean in the background
alt1: a wider shot of the Pilgrims on a snowy beach, their boat nearby
